metadata.Plot: GRS operative Jake Alexander and his team of young recruits go after the most dangerous and notorious criminals with the help of a Hong Kong billionaire.
metadata.Actors: Steven Seagal, Sonia Couling, Byron Gibson
metadata.Country: United Kingdom, Philippines, Hungary, United States
